links.title: Tesla is Still Not Making a Profit | but Investors Believe in the Future
links.description: Eight years after its IPO, Tesla (NASDAQ:TSLA) is still not making a profit. Its share price has risen nearly 2,000 percent since then, and yet, the company is considered to be "burning cash".
